title: After being Reincarnated as a Villainess, I Only Want You to be Happy. - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Caring Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Oneshot   Otome Game   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 鷹羽飛鳥
description:
I am Americaine, daughter of the Duke of D'Vogue. I am the fiancee of His Highness, the Crown Prince.
I was reincarnated in this world similar to the otome game I was addicted to in the past as a villain.
What I wish for is the happiness of His Royal Highness. To that end, I have continued to harass the heroine, aiming for the happy ending between her and His Highness. And today was the day of my conviction.>
